Kefalonia.title: Kefalonia
Kefalonia.byline: Kefalonia (Greek: Κεφαλονιά) is believed to have derived its name from the mythological figure Cephalus, the son of Hermes and a hero in ancient Greek legends.

Keflavík.title: Keflavík
Keflavík.byline: Keflavík (pronounce it "kep-la-vik") is a town in Southwest Iceland that is home to the country's international airport.
